CustomField.description: SPM Maps Advanced lookup field on the SPM Maps Account page to show how visit windows can be created and used specifically across objects or directly related to a single unique object, e.g., an Account that has a specific visit window constraint that must be taken into consideration when routing, i.e., Friday between 9-11 AM EST only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Create a Visit Window that indicates the ideal visit days and times for a specific customer. Maps Advanced will ensure all future visits are made within these windows during routing optimization. Created by: Aaron Bendickson Aug, 18 2023
CustomField.label: Maps Advanced Route Visit Windows
